changes: Smaller damage texts will now be displayed even without Short Circuit

heroes.name: Wind Mage
changes: Heal per second 25 + INT X 0.25 → INT X 0.3
Guardian of Wind (F) - Judgment of Vayu (R)

No longer costs mana or causes summon to disappear. Deals (AGI + INT) X 12.5 damage each attack, up to (3 + Base Attack Speed / 25) attacks. Deals 100% bonus damage to non-boss units. 15s CD. Specialty removed, now affected by wind affinity.

heroes.name: Priest
changes: Heal per second INT X 0.4 + INT X 0.5, bonus heal for summon Max HP X 7% → Max HP X 10%
Heal amount Max HP X 12% + 100 X Root(INT) → INT X 2.5

heroes.name: Elementalist
changes: Damage on attack INT X 6 → INT X 7.5

heroes.name: Warlock
changes: Passive skill damage bonus 25% → total damage bonus 15%

misc: Player number added beside class for easier tracking
When heroes are stunned, any queued orders will be reset
(this also fixes issue with Soul Weaver re-casting skill that was being cast after stun expires)
Skill damage no longer affects healing on some healing abilities
(Note: Not all skills were affected by skill damage.
Most self-healing abilities (ex. Berserker D, Lancer R, Crusader T, Blood Weaver D/E, etc.),
most item effects (ex. Heirloom of Lazarus active, Crown of Cleansing passive, etc.) and
all HP regen effects were not previously affected by skill damage.
Small adjustments have been made on bosses and classes, but overall intention is to reduce healing
especially in full party scenarios where main stat/skill damage bonuses are amplified greatly through buff stacking.
If bosses feel too difficult due to these changes, some additional changes may be made in upcoming patches.)

misc: Armor system changes
Boss armor changed to following levels: 400 ~ 900
Any summons of the boss, such as Agareth's soul crystal, may have lower armor than the boss itself
Armor reductions will now be % based
Corruptor / Anger / Oblivion / Desolation / Chaos will give 15% armor reduction [Type-A]
Frostweb Brooch / Heart of Ifrit / Heaven's Fist / Demonic Fist gives 12 / 15% armor reduction [Type-A]
Guardian of the skies / Ruler of the Skies will give 20% armor reduction [Type-B]
Martial Artist's E skill will now give 15% armor reduction [Type-C]
Any values of armor ignore / armor debuff will stack multiplicatively with each other
EX: With Thunderer's passive 70% armor ignore, demonic fist debuff 15%, Martial Artist E debuff 15%, target's armor will be treated as 900 * (1 - 0.7) * (1 - 0.15) * (1 - 0.15) = 195

(explanation of changes: end-game bosses will take more physical damage than before. note that your physical damage may be slightly lower than before on dummies. % reduction keeps the efficiency of armor debuffs at similar levels whether the target's armor is low or high, and will prevent physical damage from rising too high by stacking armor debuffs)
Duke token skill has been added
Training dummy
Collision size increased to 96 to better match the size of most bosses
Attack land timing has been updated to better match the attack animation

Detection duration for knockback: 2 seconds → 1 second

heroes.name: Priest
changes: Now adds 4% (light affinity) damage dealt bonus

heroes.name: Alchemist
changes: Deals 150% bonus damage to stunned targets → deals up to 300% bonus damage based on missing HP
Max damage will be applied to units unable to move / stunned paused
No longer considers stun-immune units to take max damage
Damage: INT X 2.25 (INT X 9.75 with Wind Blast) → INT X 12.5 (unaffected by Wind Blast)
Explodes upon contact with boss units or when 10 seconds elapse
No longer targetted and only Wind Blast can knock it back
No longer grows in damage over time
Casting Water Bomb near a Wind Blast will refresh its duration, makes it bigger (increase AoE slightly), and increases damage by 100% (up to 10 times)
Damage per rock: INT X 3.3 → INT X 3
Damage per cannon: INT X 9 → INT X 7.5
Cannon no longer has a limit firing range
Cannon summon / firign speed has been greatly increased
Spam casting will queue attacks without loss
Disappear if you move far away from it or if 10 seconds elapsed from last cast
Now resets cooldown on the conjures
Skill damage increase will now last for fixed 10 seconds regardless of resets

misc: Priest default model has been changed
New years costumes have been added for
Phantom Blade / Swordman (#2)
Dark Knight / Reaper
Witch / Arcane Mage
Bow Master / Sniper

name: 59d
bugs: Event - Fixed bug where minigames sometimes break
Fixed issue with Room of Sea Key icon being wrong
events: Invitation tickets can now stack into 1 slot
Invitation ticket hero detection range (when used) 800 → 1200
Winter's Gift will now go into bag automatically
Winter's Gift item drop rate increased by 100%, ticket drop rate decreased by 60%
These changes take into account that less tickets = shorter games
Mystery Box game will now end automatically if the box failed to take out a player
King Penguin token skill added
(one or two event costumes may be added before end of event)

name: 59c
misc: Correction of compensation error

name: 59b
bugs: Phantom Blade - Fixed bug where A knocks back units that are immune to knockback
Tentacle Lord - Fixed bug where silence goes through silence immunity
Underlord Agareth - Fixed areas that were not affected by pull
Zombie Lord - Fixed bug where acolyte regenerates mana while boss is reviving
Zombie Lord - Fixed bug where boss didn't reset properly
Summon Items - Fixed issue where items could be summoned over terrains
Eye of Abyss series
events: Winter Event
Will run from: January 9th, 2022 to January 27th, 2022
Snow environment effect is now limited to capital city

items.name: Voidshard Armor
changes: Once target has been paused by voidshard, it cannot be paused again by voidshard for 60 seconds

misc: Increased size of Ifirit entrance

name: 59a
bugs: Merchant - Fixed an abusable bug with T
Dark Knight - Fixed bug where RW is interrupted by cooldown reset
Shrine Priestess - Fixed bug where E pulls in knockback immune targets
Cage of Twisted Souls - Fixed issue with passive only granting 6% stat instead of 7%
Fixed bug where portals can be used while not in range of portals
events: Drop rate bonus of Winter Event will be enabled early
All bosses will have a 12% chance to appear with Festive Spirit, which grants 150% increased drop rate
This will stack multiplicatively with other drop rate bonuses
Minigames and other event rewards will be enabled at a later date
Event will last for 2 and a half weeks once this happens

items.name: Bloodstorm
changes: Proc damage: 4 X MAIN STAT → 5 X MAIN STAT

monsters.name: Monster notes
changes: Hard mode bosses will indicate that the loot chest is from Hard Mode
Loot chest text will be visible regardless of distance if you are within the boss zone
Drop rate of Coin of Effort from loot chest (DF / VALT / IFRIT) 0.15% → 0.1%

monsters.name: Chaos Elemental
changes: Weakened and drop rate of Chaos Magic Stones increased

monsters.name: Zombie Lord
changes: Boss fight can now be retried on failures
Having too many zombies will no longer trigger defeat cinematic

monsters.name: Valtora
changes: The pull-in will now be considered CC effect and can be ignored by CC immunity
Damage per second: max HP X 4 / 8% → 6% / 10%
Reduced chance of tornadoes teleporting randomly

monsters.name: Ifrit
changes: Explosion now deals daamge to main target, even in normal mode
Damage per second: 400 + max HP X 5% / 750 + max HP X 10% → max HP X 10% / max HP X 15%
Spawn count reverted to 2 in both difficulties

heroes.name: Alchemist
changes: All transmuation cooldowns have been fixed to 10 seconds

misc: Bags can no longer be summoned while they are paused (ex. while casting a skill)
Magical Loot - Magical loot summon item can be looted even if it dropped before the player loaded
Hermit - Summer costume's ult (Purify (F)) snow effect changed to be less blinding (reduced # of particles)
Guardian Angel - Sound FX removed from passive

monsters.name: Valtora
changes: Callout text size increased a bit
Debuff duration: 2 seconds → 3 seconds (same as hard)
Collision damage: 0 / max HP X 33% → max HP X 25% / max HP X 50%
Time needed to form link: 1 seconds → 2 seconds
Time needed for link to snap: 4 seconds → 3 seconds
Link no longer gets destroyed on snapping
If target cannot be linked to another target, will be linked to the boss instead for 12 seconds
If linked to boss, you take (250 + 250 X seconds elapsed in melee range) pure damage per second while in melee range of boss

heroes.name: Hermit
changes: Damage bonus for AGI main stat: 75% → 65%

heroes.name: Shrine Priestess
changes: Meeko will no longer pick up potions when attached to Shrine Priestess

name: 58h
bugs: Skeletal King Desperia - Fixed bug with boss not spawning skeletal soldiers
Death Fiend - Fixed bug with boss sometimes not despawning
Alchemist - Fixed bug where all elemental skills can be used without reaching proper level
Hermit - Fixed bug where F doesn't prevent allies HP from dropping below 1 (with Harmony effect)
Fixed loot chest text not appearing if the boss is defeated while you're hidden
Fixed issue where some materials didn't show recipes when clicked in recipe window
Fixed some description errors

items.name: Item notes
changes: Soul Blossom can now be replaced by Blood Essence
Soul Blossom can now be replaced by Emblem of Sacrifice
Soul Blossom can now be replaced by Crimson Rose

items.name: Pheles, the Bow of God
changes: Max stack on Q increased by 1

items.name: Agnitus, the Bow of Divine Fury
changes: Max stack on Q increased by 2

items.name: Heaven's Door
changes: Now can only be used on Heroes

items.name: Eye of Wallachia / Eye of the Reaper
changes: Added temporary tint at screen edge when the effect activates

monsters.name: Monster notes
changes: Token drop rate for bosses using loot chest reduced by 50%

monsters.name: Valtora
changes: Cast on farthest target → Random hero
Damage: 3000 + max HP X 25% → 2500 + max HP X 25%
Now calls out the targetted player
Pool no longer has damage on its own
will always summon pool while normal mode will summon pool only in Phase 2
Chain lightning damage: max HP X 5 ~ 10% → 2.5% / 5%
Grants boss 8% damage resistance per 1 alive
Damage per second: max HP X 10% → 4% / 8%
Targets a random player and links it to the farthest target for 5 seconds
If the targets stay apart for a long time, they will get pulled in together and be stunned
Won't be cancelled even if targets are pulled together

monsters.name: Ifrit
changes: Damage per second: 600 + max HP X 10% → 400 + max HP X 5% / 750 + max HP X 10%
Explosion no longer deals damage to the main target
Barrier start amount: 50% ~ 100% → 50% for normal, 100% for hard

monsters.name: Duke Lazarus
changes: Note: Soul Blossom will not drop from upper level bosses

heroes.name: Bow Master
changes: Arrow Count reduced to 25%, damage increased to 400%

heroes.name: Martial Artist
changes: Now activates Inner Meditation (R) for duration

misc: Save file will no longer display information regarding EXP
Bag / Storage will now display which slots are being displayed through its MP
Raid boss EXP increased
All raid boss EXP can be earned starting from level 50, but will be capped to 1 level up per kill

name: 58f
notes: Loading from v0.58f → 0.58e does not work.
bugs: Fixed bug with quest not saving properly
Endless Snow - Fixed bug with Elementalist specialty not working
Star of Apotheosis - Fixed bug where stat buff lingers for few extra seconds
Skeletal King Desperia - Fixed bug where dealing high damage to proc fall heals boss beyond normal amount
Ancient Ent - Reduced the chance that Elder Ents can get stuck in the upper area
Death Fiend - Fixed bug where summons were not affected by hard mode changes

items.name: Star of Apotheosis
changes: No longer accumulates damage done to mini boss units
Can now be reused to end buff + cause explosion prematurely

monsters.name: Death Fiend
changes: HP bonus per player beyond 5 players: 25% → 20%
Loot chest will now always appear at the location of Death Fiend
Will return to original positions after they have finished casting their charge / blink

heroes.name: Dark Knight
changes: No longer grants CC immunity to allies when main stat is INT

heroes.name: Hermit
changes: Damage: ATK DMG X 2.5 → ATK DMG X 1.5 + MAIN STAT X 5

heroes.name: Swordsman
changes: Damage per second: ATK DMG X 2 + AGI X 7.5 → ATK DMG X 4 + AGI X 15

heroes.name: Martial Artist
changes: Cast time related specs removed from all items

misc: 1st batch of Halloween event titles applied
EXP given by non-boss creeps increased about 50 ~ 25% / drop rate on low level field bosses increased
Seaside area made smaller

name: 58d

bugs: Archangel Samael - Fixed issue with empowered lightning strikes happening from 3th wave instead of 4th wave on Judgment
Death Fiend - Fixed issue with HP & MP regen stopping for Death Fiend and players sometimes
Bloodstorm - Fixed issue where using the active removes Assassin's E buff

items.name: Heartrender
changes: Now applies to elite units too (Ex. Ifrit Golems, Duke Barons & Servants)

items.name: Sanguis, the Robe of Sacrifice
changes: Damage per hit: 2500 + INT X 1 → 5000 + INT X 2

items.name: Crown of Cleansing

items.name: Cape of Insatiable Hunger
changes: Each empowered Bloody Bite resulting from the active will do 20k bonus damage

items.name: Bloodstorm
changes: Consuming the bonus proc effect will not cancel the movement speed bonus

monsters.name: Monster notes
changes: Loot chests from hard mode will now be tinted in red

monsters.name: Duke Lazarus

heroes.name: Bow Master

items.name: Prius Silver Coin
changes: Equipment = 6 silver coins for purchase / 1 for sale
Material = 9 silver coins for purchase / 1 for sale

items.name: Prius Gold Coin
changes: A new currency has been added
Note that Gnosis items cannot be sold for Gold Coins
It will only drop directly from Gnosis-tier bosses at a low chance
Following items can be purchased with Gold Coins
3x Gold coin → Any equipment / material from BD ~ SD excluding SD materials
5x Gold Coin → Any material from SD

items.name: Cage of Twisted Souls
changes: Cooldown: 1 → 60 seconds, will no longer consume soul

monsters.name: Monster notes
changes: During all boss fights, players will remain in combat as long as the boss is in combat
Alteia Bosses and above will use Wish system
you can roll for a single item with 100% chance or all items with 33% chance (excluding Coin and Token)

monsters.name: Mid bosses (Coin bosses)
changes: Base drop rate increased by about 25% on most items
Difficulty bonus 25% HP / 12.5% drop rate per player from 2 ~ 5 → 40% HP / 5% drop rate per player from 4 ~ 8
(In summary, bosses will have lower HP and more drop rate in small parties, and relatively similar values in large parties

changes: When entering the zone / fighting the boss, the zone will be revealed

heroes.name: Paladin

heroes.name: Hermit

misc: Added back functionality to retrieve lower icons when you possess Master Icon

items.name: Item notes
changes: Following items now show charge percentage using item charges

items.name: Crimson Star series
changes: Shooter spec - Skill damage buff is now unique and stacks with Staff of Abyss / Soul of Abyss series

items.name: Heartrender
changes: Deals 15% bonus damage to units above 50% HP → below 50% HP (same as ender)

items.name: Robe of Storm
changes: Tick damage: INT X 2 → 4000 + INT X 2
Cooldown: (before you can start stacking it again) 15 seconds → 5 seconds

2nd use (targetted): Sends all summoned wraith toward target

monsters.name: Wallachia Graveyard
changes: The zone can now be exited/entered without cooldown, as long as Mad Clown is not casting Wheel of Despair and Death Fiend isn't summoned

monsters.name: Death Fiend
changes: Summoning cinematic can now be skipped

heroes.name: Knight
changes: Distanced damage: up to (max MP X 3) bonus damage and breaks barriers → up to (8 X damage reduction + 4 X magic defense)% bonus damage based on distance
Breaking barriers increases this skill's damage by (20 + 0.1 X knight's damage reduction)% → increases this skill's damage by 50%

heroes.name: Trickster
changes: Trickster will receive bigger changes later

heroes.name: Phantom Blade
changes: Damage: ATK DMG X 0.6 + AGI X 3 → ATK DMG X 0.8 + AGI X 5
Damage: ATK DMG X 0.9 + AGI X 6 → ATK DMG X 1 + AGI X 7.5
On successful block, soul restore count: 4 → 8
Damage increase on Alacrity (Q): 100% → 40% (AGI X 16 → AGI X 14)

heroes.name: Hermit
changes: If AGI is higher, your skills will do 75% more damage
If STR/INT is higher, your skills heal 100% more and gain Harmony effect
Harmony: Does not cost MP (but incurs 2.5 second cooldown) and can be used on allies to dash to them
Heal amount changed from MAIN STAT X 1.5 → MAIN STAT X 0.75
Periodic heal reduced: (STR + INT) X 0.3 → (STR + INT) X 0.15
Heal amount: MAIN STAT X 0.5 → MAIN STAT X 0.25
Harmony: Skill damage bonus increased by (MAIN STAT / 325)%
Damage: MAIN STAT X 37.5 → MAIN STAT X 40
Base effect will only deal damage + cleanse allies
Harmony: Provides shield to affected allies as well, release will pull in enemies instead of pushing them back
Damage per second: MAIN STAT X 57.5 → MAIN STAT X 50
Base effect will only deal damage + break shield
Harmony: cleanses allies and heals their HP by 15% per second and prevents their HP from dropping below 1
Duration: 0.35 seconds + 3.65 cast time → 3 seconds cast time

heroes.name: Fire Mage
changes: Damage per fragment: INT X 9 → INT X 15 (total damage: INT X 72 → INT X 75)
Now falls down faster and more accurately
Damage per shard: INT X 3 → INT X 5 (total shard damage: INT X 36 → INT X 50)
Once learned, increases base damage by Fireball by 200% (INT X 8 → INT X 24 ; does nt increase bonus damage based on burn)

heroes.name: Water Mage
changes: Frost Armament damage counts as periodic damage

heroes.name: Alchemist
changes: Fixed issue with golem being too transparent

heroes.name: Warlock
changes: Attack range is now doubled while Demonic Fury (T) is active

heroes.name: Blood Weaver
changes: Base damage: ATK DMG X 0.375 → ATK DMG X 0.50
Before patch: 6 casts deal ATK DMG X 19.125 damage
After patch: 5 casts deal ATK DMG X 17.5 damage
After max stacks cast, the skill will be disabled and re-enabled with stack resets after 1.5 seconds

misc: When reviving in town, mount will be summoned immediately
You can skip cinematics for minor bosses as soon as powders have been used before the cinematic triggers
Added “-skip” command, which toggles the option to automatically skip any cinematics (this option saves in to your code)
“-exp” command has been removed
Fixed issue with Soul Devourer VFX being slightly misaligned
Reduced size of rain VFX on Skylord slightly

name: 50c
misc: Combat spoils system adjustments
Chests now spawn always instead of 50% base chance
Bonus drop rate now affects chance of obtaining items from chests
drop rate increase per player starting from 2 reduced from 25% to 12.5% (from 100% to 50% max)
Guardian angels now drop 1 chest once all 3 are killed
Early and mid-game boss drop rates slightly re-adjusted to accommodate for above changes
Lvl requirement to use early game boss chests reduced from 60 to 0 (if there are no level 60 or above heroes present then chests cannot spawn or be used)
Item Adjustments
Weapons of crimson flames (Ragnaar drops) - Fixed on-attack proc not working properly
Flame cloak - Damage reduced from 5000 per 0.5 seconds to 750 per 0.5 seconds
Ring of the dead - Fixed still having old stats
Stone armor/Bat wings - Item class reduced from Epic to Rare
Monster Adjustments
Wallachia monstrosity - Fixed teleporting to unintended locations
Guardian of sea - Attack damage reduced, Water orb damage reduced from 25000 to 2500, amount of Water orb explosion waves reduced from 8 to 4
Count of wallachia - Summon cinematic now starts for all players in Duchy of wallachia, not just those near summon spot, and attack damage increase from True form reduced from 8000 to 3000
Demon lord beriel - Portal is now invulnerable during invasion start cinematic
Turtle lord - Fixed hp regen of summoned turtles being too high
Shadow dragon irbert - Added floating text near summon spot to show how many magic stones are needed, Darkness activation damage reduced from 15000 to 4500
Ancient ent - Players can now exit the arena is the boss fight didn't start, fixed hp regen being too low
Valtora - All orbs within arena now dissapear once boss dies
Fixed some stats of end-game bosses being set too low
Minor balance changes to lvling bosses (Further adjustments will be done over future patches)
Hero Adjustments
Fixed not learned spells sometimes activating
Paladin - Holy divide (Q) damage increased from 60% attack damage to 100% attack damage, Ruinbringer spec bonus damage reduced from 100% to 25%, Calamity spec bonus damage reduced from 150% to 50%
Thunderer - Fixed Disable thunder shield hotkey being (R) instead of (E)
Martial artist - Fixed Vacuum palm (E) max armor reduction being 175 instead of 125
Misc Adjustments
Fixed some spell descriptions
Martial Artist - Vacuum Palm (E)
Fixed some item descriptions
Soul Stone
Spirit of Nightmare
Flame Cloak
Removed Alchemy/Quests from Jaina
Fixed food not getting removed when selecting new character
Fixed attack speed not increasing properly from 0~90 agi points
Fixed Training gym-related text being in english
Changed shoreline terrain to prevent units getting stuck
Hero reset option in Training gym now more clearly explains that using it will force players to stay in it for 5 minutes
Corrected mana cost of spells (Since all spells are now at level 1 it was lower than intended)
Fixed entrance to Dragon's nest causing lava damage in places where there's no lava
Fixed players being able to go through stones in Cave-like terrains

Other Adjustments

items.name: Item notes
changes: Stats of all items have been reduced to ~30% of original
Armor provided by items has been reduced
Most early game items dropped by mobs have been deleted or changed
Overall number of early game items have been reduced
Description format of items slightly changed
Recipe system has been reworked to have a separate UI
Currently doesn't display extra inform (blue text) for most items, for now refer to forum's item list
Armor/Robe have been fused into a single class
Helmet/Hood have been fused into a single class
Longswords/Greatswords have been fused into 'melee' class
All-character weapons (like The Ender) can now be used by everyone
Item grade system has been reworked
Materials now also have a grade
Epic item grade Alkatra has been removed
Item grades now more clearly indicate what boss tier item is dropped/crafted from
Epic (Deltirama) - Drops/crafts from Jack ~ Guardian angels
Epic (Neptinos) - Drops/crafts from Demon lord beriel ~ Turtle lord
Epic (Gnosis) - Drops/crafts from Skeleton king desperia ~ Shadow dragon irbert
Added Coin of Effort exchange item
Bag expansion ticket (costs 2 Coins of Effort)
Increases amount of bag slots by 6
Can be bought up to 2 times

items.name: Ancient Writings
changes: Now only drops from Mage Lord

items.name: Sealed Archangel Wings
changes: Has been removed from all recipes
If you still have it you can trade it away for 4 Prius Silver Coin

monsters.name: Monster notes
changes: Stats of stronger bosses have been reduced to ~30% of original
Magic resistance has been removed from all bosses
Bosses no longer share a single memory stone, instead when a boss dies an individual memory stone will spawn nearby
Number of available respawns depends on the boss and no longer requires mana

monsters.name: Early game bosses (Ruler of the Lav Sea ~ Demon Lord Beriel)
changes: Cinematic played by Ruler of Lav Sea ~ Wings of Death summon will play only for nearby players, and can be skipped by pressing Esc
Anti-magic shield ability removed and some boss spells have been reworked
Starting from 2 players max HP increased by 50%, Combat spoils chest spawn rate increased by 25%
Maxes out at 5 player max HP increased by 200%, combat spoils chest spawn rate increased by 100%
Item and material drop rates increased by 50 ~ 100% to accomodate for combat spoils chest system

monsters.name: Mid-game bosses (Spirit Beast ~ Turtle Lord)
changes: Some boss spells have been reworked

monsters.name: Combat spoils system
changes: Early and mid-game bosses now have a chance to spawn a combat spoils chest on death instead of dropping items
All players that participated in boss fight can use Roll for loot (Q) button in chest for a chance to obtain personal boss drops
Magical ore deposit and Remnants of darkness system has been removed
Crystal golem tokens now have a chance to drop from bosses as usual
Bonus drop rate increases chance of combat spoils chest spawning, but not chance of obtaining items from it
Chest spawn rate is 50% (100% with 5+ players)

monsters.name: Archangel Samael
changes: Summoning: 2 Holy Powders → 3 White Magic Stones

monsters.name: Death Fiend
changes: Summoning: 20 Red Powders → 12 Red Magic Stones

monsters.name: Agareth
changes: Players can no longer teleport out of boss arena

heroes.name: Hero notes
changes: Magic damage output of all spells has been reduced to match magic resistance being removed from bosses
Due to magic resistance being removed some pure damage spells have been changed accordingly
Reaper - Whirl of Death (Q) base damage increased by ~120%, during Death's Dash (E) it no longer changes to pure damage and instead deals 200% more damage
Paladin - Holy Aura (D) base damage increased by ~233%, when Aura of Retribution (Q) is active it no longer changes to pure damage and instead deals 100% more damage to boss units
Dark Knight - Abyssal Slam (W) based damage increased by ~122%, if STR is main stat it no longer changes to pure damage and instead deals 0 ~ 200% more damage based on hero level

heroes.name: Merchant
changes: Spell icon now shows while on cooldown and indicates remaining cooldown

heroes.name: Lancer
changes: Now reduces MOV SPD of targets hit by 90% for 2 seconds

heroes.name: Thunderer
changes: Attack now ingores 40% of target's armor
Adds (150% ATK DMG + (STR + AGI) X 5) bonus damage every 4th attack → Every 4th attack hits twice
Next 3 attacks activate Swift Strike (D) as pure damage → Adds bonus pure damage to next 3 attacks

heroes.name: Sniper
changes: Each arrow no longer counts as single-target effect

heroes.name: Arcane Mage
changes: Healing: 4% of damage done → 25% of damage done (to accomodate for magic damage reduction)

heroes.name: Wind Mage
changes: Duration listed in description corrected: 45 seconds → 50 seconds

heroes.name: Warlock
changes: Bonus damage to targets in center: 300% → 100%
Activation count: 5 + ATK SPD / 15 → 5 + ATK SPD / 25
Now deals up to 150% more damage based on target's missing HP

heroes.name: Priest
changes: No longer deals damage based on target's missing HP

misc: Max level has been reduced: 420 → 100
When loading old code your level will be divided by 4 (players over level 400 will load at level 100)
All spells are now set at level 1 and will be learned automatically
Some spells that are too powerful early on will be learned later
Max stat points: 2396 → 697
When loading old code your stat point will be reset, please add them manually
Leveling areas are now separated by 10 levels each
Short tutorial system has been added
It will guide players through the beginning of the game
Terrain of early areas (Level 1 ~ 40) and fairy forest have been changed
Added Hearthstone to Alfon Village and Prius Captial to set respawn points for players
Coin trader, Weird Magician NPCs and Mage Tower are now located in Prius Captial
Added new training gym area to Prius Captial
Powder System
Power system reworked to make gameplay more natural for players without prior knowledge of it
Two types of Magic Veins have been added throughout map
Small veins spawn randomly in leveling areas. Disappears after some hits from pickaxe
Giant veins spawn in set locations and do not have a mining limit
Powder box removed, magic stones are stored in bag when you press (E)
Magic stone absorption spell of token updated
Absorbs all magic stones in target area
If target area contains a magic vein starts mining it at 3 times speed
Magic stones mined this way are gathered into bag automatically
Elemental Key crafting: 3 magic stones of specific color + 3 chaos magic stones
Fatigue system removed
Multiplayer bonuses changed and detailed info about them will be shown in-game
Old: EXP gain increases by 2.5% per player
New: EXP gain increases by 2%, Monster respawn times and item boss summon item cooldowns reduces by 4% per player
Spell learning menu has been changed to stat point menu
You can still use stat commands to use stat points
Added a separate Closet unit to bag space
Removed button from bags
With QWER / ASDF / ZXCV buttons you can browse cosmetic item sections in new closet

Dev Notes:
Big update will happen in v0.50, it will come out when its ready and until then only minor patches/bug fixes will happen for v0.44
Approximate v0.50 changelog:
- Rework of early game bosses and powder-based summoning system
- Tutorial system addition
- Max level reduced to 100
- Magic resistance of bosses removed and damage numbers adjusted accordingly
- Overall scaling down of numbers for future updates (50000 will become 5000 and such)
Because v0.50 will have a lot of changes there'll be short adaptation period, after which any new content will be activated in v0.51

monsters.name: Monster notes
changes: Difficulty system rebalanced for mid level bosses
Before change: Starting from 5th player bosses gain 7.5% damage resistance and drop rate per player (if damage resistance was HP increase it would've been 81.8% at max scaling)
After change: Starting from 6th player bosses gain 20% HP and 20% drop rate per player (100% bonus HP at max scaling)
Difficulty system rebalanced for bosses Skeleton King and above
Before change: Before change: Starting from 7th player bosses gain 7.5% damage resistance and drop rate per player (if damage resistance was HP increase it would've been 42.9% at max scaling)
After change:  Starting from 6th player bosses gain 20% HP and 20% drop rate per player (100% bonus HP at max scaling)

misc: System
Changed formulas for 'MR Reduction' and 'Bonus Damage Taken' debuffs to count them as sum of operations instead of multiplicative operations.
Ex: Target with 50% MD buff, 10% MR Reduction, and 20% Magic Defense debuff:
Before: 0.50 X 1.10 X 1.20 = 66% final Magic Damage received
After: 0.50 X (1.00 + 0.10 + 0.20) = 65% final Magic Damage received
